vote.title: To authorize the Director of the Department of Development to enter into a not-for-profit service contract with Greater Columbus Chamber of Commerce in an amount not to exceed $167,000.00 for the purpose of administering the Accelerate Columbus: Scale Up and Grow program; to authorize the expenditure of $167,000.00 from ACPO008426; to allow for payment of services starting March 1, 2023; and to declare an emergency. ($167,000.00)
vote.description: This item was approved on the Consent Agenda.
